channel.title: lint on Vegetable Programing
channel.description: Recent content in lint on Vegetable Programing

item.title: shellcheck
item.description: インストール mac brew install shellcheck shellcheck を使おう - Qiita 使い方 $ shellcheck hoge.sh $ shellcheck tweet.sh In tweet.sh line 38: tmp="/tmp/$$" ^-^ SC2034: tmp appears unused. Verify use (or export if used externally). In tweet.sh line 102: if [ "$CONSUMER_KEY" = '' -a \ ^-- SC2166: Prefer [ p ] && [ q ] as [ p -a q ]
